name: Unfriendly Fire
description:
Use the turrets to shoot at your opponent to win! BUT with a twist:

WHEN YOU HIT THE BUTTON, THE TURRETS WILL SHOOT AT YOU!

---

A simple two player game made in GMS2 while I was learning the engine! I hope you enjoy!

Controls:

Player 1Player 2MoveWASDArrowsShootVShift
